mapper.insert: insert into goods_pic (id, goods_id, picture_url, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, goods_id, picture_url, create_time, update_time from goods_pic
